name: Wacky Gravity: An Unstable Ludum Dare 49 Entry!
name_original: Wacky Gravity: An Unstable Ludum Dare 49 Entry!
description:
Wacky Gravity: An Unstable Ludum Dare 49 Entry!

I’m an 11-year-old Unity game designer and Maker. This is my first Ludum Dare entry and second game jam ever. Wacky Gravity was made without any assets. Tools used: Unity, Blender, Garageband, Audition, Photoshop. LD aside, I’m currently developing a Lunar Lander type game which I plan to release on the Amico or Switch, so stay tuned!

Wacky Gravity
IN THE NEAR FUTURE…

Mars has collided with another planet causing gravity to become unstable…

To save the lives of humans on Mars Colony 404, a Gravimax 9001 machine was dispatched to bring balance to the gravity…

And now…it’s up to me, Albert Einbox, to deliver the Gravimax 9001 and save humanity!

The only thing standing in my way is whatever obstacles the game designer threw into this Ludum Dare game…

LET'S FIND OUT!
